name: Rally
headline: Financial OS for European Fleets
description: Rally is a financial platform designed for fleets in Europe. We help blue-collar businesses like truckers, tradesmen and utilities, track all their vehicle and driver costs in one place with real-time data and AI-powered workflows for accounting and sustainability reporting. Our flagship product is a universal fleet card that covers fuel, EV charging, parking, tolls and more, with dynamic spend controls and fraud protection. At Rally, we’re building the financial backbone for transportation, enabling payments, credit, invoicing, tax rebates, driver payroll and beyond.

founders.name: Thiago Peres, Founder
founders.description: Second time founder and Product Leader experienced in building products at billion-user scale. ex-Stripe, Meta, Booking. CS dropout. Got acquihired by biggest e-commerce in LATAM.

founders.name: Nick Telecki, Founder
founders.description: CEO Rally. 2x Founder. Previously built a delivery startup, scaling it to $3M ARR in 1 year. Before that, managed global strategy at Delivery Hero across 50+ markets. Bring a decade of experience across finance, tech and logistics.

generated_description:
Rally is an innovative fintech startup on a mission to serve as the "Financial OS for European Fleets." Founded in 2025 and part of Y Combinator's W25 batch, Rally is carving out a niche by providing a comprehensive financial platform tailored for blue-collar businesses like truckers, tradesmen, and utility services across Europe.

The core of Rally's offering revolves around a universal fleet card that simplifies expense management by encompassing fuel, EV charging, parking, tolls, and more—all under one card. This gives businesses the ability to implement dynamic spending controls and offers robust fraud protection. With Rally, fleet managers can oversee all related vehicle and driver costs in real time using AI-powered workflows that enhance accounting and sustainability reporting.

Rally aims to be the financial backbone for transportation, a one-stop solution that handles payments, credit, invoicing, tax rebates, and payroll for drivers. They're not just another payment platform; they provide real-time data visibility, customizable spending limits, and strong fraud alert mechanisms to empower fleet operators to manage their expenses effectively.

With a lean team of just two employees, Rally is backed by the esteemed Y Combinator and operates with a vision of making fleet management simpler, safer, and more cost-effective. Whether you need to set up specific controls over non-fuel purchases or access detailed analytics to make informed decisions, Rally has you covered.

If you want to learn more, check them out at [getrally.com](https://www.getrally.com/). 

In summary, Rally is streamlining fleet financial management for the European market, making it a smarter choice in an often cumbersome industry.
